DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Trial design : Prospective observational study 2 . Target population : 200 NSCLC patient histologically cytologically confirm stage IV recurrent NSCLC progressive disease 1st line chemotherapy consent study participation meet study selection criterion 3 . Primary objective : To investigate C-met expression/amplification EGFR gene mutation NSCLC patient treat Erlotinib - C-met expression IHC C-met amplification SISH EGFR mutation real time PCR 4 . We also assess correlation EGFR mutation c-MET clinical outcome ( Overall Response Rate , Progression Free survival ) 5 . Duration Trial Recruitment : 2 year
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Observational Study Evaluating c-MET Expression EGFR Gene Mutation Correlation With Erlotinib Response
DOC.criteria: Informed consent 19~80 year old male female Histologically proven advance metastatic NSCLC Failed 1st line chemotherapy Tumor tissue genetic analysis Evaluable target lesion RECIST v1.1 ECOG performance 0 3 Expected survival 12 week Previous treatment EGFRtyrosine kinase inhibitor Severe hypersensitivity erlotinib Residual toxicity ( grade 2 ) previous chemotherapy Total bilirubin 1.5x upper normal limit Liver function test 2.5x upper normal limit
